title: Ice Knife
content:
Ice Knife Level 1 Conjuration Spell 3~22 Damage 1d10Piercing +2d6Cold Throw a shard of ice that deals 1∼10 Piercing damage. It explodes and deals 2∼12 Cold damage to anyone nearby creating an ice surface. This spell can be cast while you are Silenced. 2 turns On Miss: The shard of ice still explodes. 2m 18m DEX Save Attack Roll Action Level 1 Spell Slot
